name: NullFlow Part 1
description: Learn about web development in vanilla HTML and CSS!

name: Intro to Kali Linux
description: Learn about the basics of Linux CLI with a pentester's distribution of choice.

name: NullFlow Part 2
description: Continue learning about web development in vanilla JS, and learn about the importance of web security through a real-world case study.

name: Intro to Web Security
description: Learn about basic web security concepts and vulnerabilities commonly exploited in web applications!

name: Pwn: Zero to Hero
description: Go from zero to hero in low-level binary exploitation, including techniques like buffer overflow, ROP chaining, kernel pwn and more!

name: Hack N Flag
description: Test your cybersecurity skills against your peers in NullSec's first flagship Capture the Flag (CTF) event!
